greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest prime contained as binary substring in binary representation of n>1, a(1)=1.
comment: a(n)<=3 and for n>1: a(n)>=2 and a(n)=3 iff n=2^k-1, k>1.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: For n > 1: a(n) = A036987(n) + 2. _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 14 2013
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 08 2002
